scripts.compileBrowserify: npm run cleanBrowserify && browserify ./target-typescript/example.js --outfile ./target-browserify/example.js && browserify ./target-typescript/main.js --standalone initStickyTableHeader --outfile ./target-browserify/main.js
scripts.compile: rm -rf ./target && mkdir ./target && npm run compileTypescript && npm run compileBrowserify && npm run copy
